name: Sarah Chen
content: TIAI Solutions transformed our weekly reporting from a 2-day manual process to a 15-minute automated workflow. The accuracy and insights are game-changing.

name: Michael Rodriguez
content: The margin simulator helped us optimize our pricing strategy and increased profitability by 3.2% in just one quarter. Exceptional ROI.

name: Jennifer Walsh
content: Their CAPEX tracking system gives us real-time visibility into all our projects. No more surprises, just data-driven decisions.

name: David Park
content: The automated KPI dashboard saves us 20 hours per week and provides insights we never had before. Outstanding work.

name: Lisa Thompson
content: Implementation was seamless and the team provided excellent training. Our forecasting accuracy improved by 25%.
